text: A crime is generally a deliberateunwanteddeliberatingdelineatedeliberateact that results in harm, physical or otherwise, toward one or more people, in a manner encourageduninhibitedprohibitedfreedprohibitedby law. The determination of which acts are to be considered criminal has variedhypsographyhistoricalhistoricallybeautifullyhistoricallyand continues to do so among cultures and nations. When a crime is committed, a process of discoverydiscovereddiscoverdismantlingdiscovery, trial by judge or jury, convolutionconvictionconventionconversionconvictionand punishment occurs. Just as what is considered criminal varies between jurisdictions, so does the punishment, but elements of restituterestrictedrestitutionresidingrestitutionanddetectiondeterminedetergentdeterrencedeterrenceare common.
